channel.title: NPC Questions
channel.description:
[img]http://img300.imageshack.us/img300/1569/serverpicdd8.jpg[/img] Green: I want to move these NPC's. Red: I want to change the place where he teles you; and I want to change the NPC Blue: I want to move him, put the option Trade on him AND get him to stop saying "Phonecheck is OFFLINE!"
I am using PhoneScape V2 as my Source. Thanks in advance.

item.title: NPC Questions
item.dc:creator: @blade9670 blade9670
item.description:
@blade9670 wrote:

green: go into yur auto spawn find the npc id and change their co-ordinates to what you want
Red: Not sure i would know if i was playing with the client
Blue: go in to autospawn and search his npc id and change his co-ordinates
Blue: to change what he says go into yur npchandler search “Phonecheck is OFFLINE!”
and change the name to yours

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Questions

item.description:

Green: I want to move these NPC’s.
